title.value: Влияние предпосевной обработки гуанидинсодержащими препаратами на прорастание семян и рост сеянцев томата
Influence of presowing treatment with guanidine-containing preparations on tomatoe seed germination and seedling growth
Influence of presowing treatment with guanidine-containing preparations on tomatoe seed germination and seedling growth

journal.title: Vegetable Growing : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Sakharchuk, T.N., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Pradun, O.M., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Tarasevich, V.A., National Academy of Sciences (Belarus). The Institute of Chemistry of New Materials

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented data on the results of researching into guanidine-containing preparations for applying on tomato (Lycopersicon esculentum). Influence of seed treatment on their germination, seedling growth and development of tomato was investigated. The growth-promoting concentrations for presowing tomato seed treatment were defined. It was experimentally found that treatment of tomato seeds with guanidine-containing plant preparations increased their crop quality, accelerates the growth and development of seedlings. On the basis of complex indicators it could be concluded that the most effective for the treatment of seeds of tomato were the following: 0.01% solutions of polyhexamethyleneguanidine phosphate, chloride polyhexamethyleneguanidine and its composition with carbamide complex, as well as 0.1% sodium chloride in the composition polyhexamethyleneguanidine with colloidal silver.
